original_text:
For what do they care for their houses after them,
    when the number of their months is cut off?
korean_text: 그의 달 수가 다하면 자기 집에 대하여 무슨 관계가 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: For what do they care for their houses after them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 죽은 후에 그들의 집을 무엇을 위해 염려하겠는가?

sentences.original_text: when the number of their months is cut off?
